title: Hour 2: Top Playmakers
description:
Stephen A., Michael Irvin, Ryan Clark, Adam Schefter and Kendrick Perkins discuss Draymond's apology for punching Jordan Poole, Schefty breaks the news of Matt Rhule being fired and do Keenan Allen tweets smell trouble in Los Angeles?

itunes:subtitle: Who did Michael Irvin select as his biggest playmakers this week?
